backend/main.mo: Defines actor backend with authorization, storage, Stripe integration, and domain types for teams, players, sponsors, and comparisons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark mode definitions for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, React Query, theming, and imports all main pages including admin sections.
frontend/src/capacitor-config.ts: Empty placeholder file for Capacitor configuration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: UI screen informing unauthorized users with return-home button.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard controlling admin access with redirects and loading states.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: React countdown timer computing remaining time and rendering styled time units updated every second.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying about info, navigation links, contact details, and a disclaimer with a scroll-to-top handler.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, navigation links, admin links, authentication-aware UI, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, WhatsApp button, and auto-scrolling to top on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with status indicators and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and submitting user profile details with validation and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button opening a prefilled message thread.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on identity, with query invalidation on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling AuthClient creation, login state, and identity persistence. Exposes a hook to access identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including user profile, admin checks, authentication-aware queries, and mutations. Integrates identity and actor state to control query behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, typography, and light/dark color palettes for the application. Applies base styling for layout, text, and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global CSS and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a styled About page describing the vision, mission, and features of the Bihar Cricket Mahotsav. Uses cards, icons, and gradient sections to display informational content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard displaying registration, payment, and sponsor stats with loading skeletons. Uses route guards, React Query data, and UI components to show administrative metrics.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Handles admin authentication via Internet Identity, redirects admins, and manages bootstrap and principal-ID actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlayersPage.tsx: Fetches and manages player registrations with search, payment toggling, and CSV export features.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSponsorsPage.tsx: Displays sponsor inquiries, supports status updates and deletion, and shows summary stats.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTeamsPage.tsx: Lists team details with logos and purse info, with loading skeletons and read-only management.
frontend/src/pages/AuctionTeamsPage.tsx: Shows auction rules and participating teams with logos and descriptive UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact methods including location, email, WhatsApp, and quick info sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero section, key tournament highlights, team logos, and CTA navigation for registration and info pages.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the full tournament flow using step-by-step cards with images, covering registration through the grand final.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancelPage.tsx: Displays a cancelled payment message with help info and buttons to retry registration or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies payment via query params and shows payment details, confirmation, and next steps after successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerRegistrationPag: Provides a validated multi-field player registration form with prefill, submission handling, and eligibility checks.
frontend/src/pages/PrizesPage.tsx: Shows prize pool details with cards and images for winners, runner-up, man of the series, and participation rewards.
frontend/src/pages/SponsorshipPage.tsx: Renders a sponsorship inquiry form with validation, submission via hook, and displays sponsorship tiers and benefits.
frontend/src/pages/TeamsDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays official teams with logos, descriptions, and a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/polyfills/processEnv.ts: Polyfills process.env at runtime and sets II_URL from meta env or a default fallback.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy utility with modern API support and mobile-friendly fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, typography, colors, layout settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, architectural notes, and feature requirements for the site.
